pageContext.claim: “Big story out that the FBI ignored tens of thousands of Crooked Hillary Emails, many of which are REALLY BAD. Also gave false election info. I feel sure that we will soon be getting to the bottom of all of this corruption. At some point I may have to get involved!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to a report from Real Clear Investigations that has not been independently confirmed by any other major news outlet. Former FBI Director James B. Comey testified that of the emails found on Weiner's laptop, "we've only had to personally read 6,000," because a computer scan could eliminate those that had already been reviewed. The agents determined this did not change their original conclusion in the Clinton probe.
